title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5006.1 - Definitions as used in this Part
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5006.1 - Definitions as used in this Part

State Regulations
(a) Service. Twenty days of service rendered
on and after July 1, 1968 shall be equivalent to one year of service solely for
the purpose of continuing membership. (b) Year. A year means a school year
beginning July 1st of one year and ending June 30th of the following
year. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5006.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
